vulnerability_findings.name: reentrancy-eth
vulnerability_findings.message:
Reentrancy in ETH_VAULT.cashOut (patch_6.sol#20-25):

	- require(bool)(msg.sender.call.value(_amount)()) (patch_6.sol#22)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- balances (patch_6.sol#23)
